import React from 'react' import './CheckoutItem.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity }}) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
console.log(cartItem)} className='remove-button'>✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ remove: (item) => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)) }) export default connect()(CheckoutItem)
